Customers should use caution when entering and exiting trains, and on platforms and staircases. North End Access Elevator at 47th Street & Madison Ave. Out of Service Starting Feb. 6

Effective Monday, February 6, the Grand Central North End Access elevator at 47th Street and Madison Avenue will be out of service while work to extend it to the future East Side Access LIRR concourse is conducted. Alternate ADA entrances are located at: 43rd Street and Lexington Avenue 105 East 42nd Street Elevator service is expected to return in 2018. For questions or concerns about this work, please call 511 or visit www.mta.info for more information. For comments or concerns about East Side Access, please call (855) 4-MTAESA, email outreach@mtacc-esa.info or visit www.mta.info/esa for more information. We appreciate your patience during this project.

North End Access Elevator at 47th Street & Madison Ave. Out of Service Starting Feb. 6

Effective Monday, February 6, the Grand Central North End Access elevator at 47th Street and Madison Avenue will be out of service while work to extend it to the future East Side Access LIRR concourse is conducted. Alternate ADA entrances are located at: 43rd Street and Lexington Avenue 105 East 42nd Street Elevator service is expected to return in 2018. For questions or concerns about this work, please call 511 or visit www.mta.info for more information. For comments or concerns about East Side Access, please call (855) 4-MTAESA, email outreach@mtacc-esa.info or visit www.mta.info/esa for more information. We appreciate your patience during this project.

N Line - Weekday and Weekend Planned Service Changes

6:45 AM to 7 PM, Saturday, Feb 4 Astoria-bound N trains skip 39 Av, 36 Av, Broadway, and 30 Av, due to preventive maintenance. All times until Spring 2017 Astoria-bound N trains skip 86 St, Avenue U, Kings Hwy, 20 Av, 18 Av, New Utrecht Av, and Fort Hamilton Pkwy, due to station improvements. N trains stop at Bay Pkwy and 8 Av. To 86 St, Avenue U, and Kings Hwy, take the Astoria-bound N to Bay Pkwy and transfer to a Coney Island-bound N. To 20 Av, 18 Av, New Utrecht Av, and Fort Hamilton Pkwy, take the Astoria-bound N to 8 Av and transfer to a Coney Island-bound N. From these stations, take a Coney Island-bound N to Bay Pkwy or Stillwell Av and transfer to an Astoria-bound N. Or, from New Utrecht Av-62 St, take the D instead. Transfer to an Astoria-bound N at 36 St.
